data.title: The Impossible Question Powered by Warm Glow
data.text:
QUESTION:

Nearly 80% of all women say this is one of their biggest regrets; what is it?

This is something they regret from their high school years

ANSWER:

Nearly 80% of all women say that one of their biggest regrets is their high school hairstyle!

Congratulations to Kim Myles of Richmond for being the first to answer the Impossible Question correctly!

QUESTION:

About 40% of all people still have one at their home but it never ever gets used; what is it?

It typically can be found stashed away in a drawer

When you were using it you typically used it every single day, multiple times a day

ANSWER:

Over 40% of all people still have an old cell phone at their house that they never use.

Congratulations to Britney Brandt of Richmond for being the first to answer the Impossible Question correctly!

QUESTION:

Over 60% of all teens admit to doing this at night without their parents knowing; what is it?

It typically happens in one specific room of the house

Mom and dad are probably more likely to get frustrated with this more than get mad

The more they do this, the more money it can cost mom and dad

ANSWER:

Over 60% of all teens admit to raiding the refrigerator at night without their parents knowing about it!

Congratulations to Jesse Bromagem of Gettysburg, OH for being the first to answer the Impossible Question correctly!

QUESTION:

You are about 40% less likely to get dates if you do this online; what is it?

It has everything to do with your appearance

It has everything to do with what you are wearing

ANSWER:

You are about 40% less likely to get dates if you wear sunglasses in your profile pic!

Congratulations to Crystal Wehrley of Richmond for being the first to answer the Impossible Question correctly!

QUESTION:

This is one of the first things most people will do after breaking up with someone; what is it?

It’s an easy way to let people know you are now single

ANSWER:

One of the first things a person will do after going through a break-up is change their online relationship status!

Congratulations to Sarah Andrews of Richmond for being the first to answer the Impossible Question correctly!

QUESTION:

About 20% of all people say they carry this on them at all times; what is it?

It easily fits in your pocket or purse

ANSWER:

About 20% of all people say they carry chewing gum on them at all times!

Congratulations to Ronnie Hittle of Richmond for being the first to answer the Impossible Question correctly!

QUESTION:

A little less than 10% of all people admit that they have cried at the end of this; what is it?

You are probably crying because you don’t want it to end

ANSWER:

A little less than 10% of all people admit that they have cried at the end of their vacation!

Congratulations to Owen Brummett of New Castle, IN for being the first to answer the Impossible Question correctly!

QUESTION:

About 10% of all people say they can never get enough of this; what is it?

It happens outside

ANSWER:

About 10% of all people say they can never get enough sunshine!

Congratulations to Tamra DeGroat of Connersville, IN for being the first to answer the Impossible Question correctly!

QUESTION:

About half of all people say they have used their lunch hour at work to do this; what is it?

It’s rare that anyone would really want to do this

ANSWER:

About half of all people have used their lunch hour to catch up on their work and not get paid for it.

Congratulations to Tracy Fields of Portland, IN for being the first to answer the Impossible Question correctly!

QUESTION:

When first dating about 20% of all people agree that you are most likely to lie about this; what is it?

It’s something close to you

It is alive

ANSWER:

When first dating, about 20% of all people agree that you are most likely to lie about your parents, brothers or sisters.

Congratulations to Judy Retz of Winchester, IN for being the first to answer the Impossible Question correctly!

QUESTION:

About 70% of all parents admit that their children are better at doing this than they are; what is it?

Ironically, it’s something that the parents most likely taught their children to do

It’s something that you typically do at least once a day.

It’s something at the beginning of your day and before you leave the house

ANSWER:

About 70% of all parents admit that their children are better than they are at choosing what clothes to wear!

Congratulations to Miranda Grimm of Richmond for being the first to answer the Impossible Question correctly!

QUESTION:

Nearly 25% of all people say they would change this at their workplace if they were allowed; what is it?

It typically wouldn’t be cheap for your employer to do this

It can often affect the mood of people at your workplace

It also has everything to do with being inside the building

ANSWER:

Nearly 25% of all people say they would change the decor of their workplace if they were allowed!

QUESTION:

30% of all people agree that this is the worst thing about going on vacation; what is it?

It’s something that everyone has to do at some time or another out of necessity

ANSWER:

30% of all people say that the worst thing about going on vacation is using dirty public restrooms.

Congratulations to Art McRill of Greenville, OH for being the first to answer the Impossible Question correctly!

QUESTION:

About 30% of all people said they didn’t feel like an adult until they started doing this; what is it?

It’s something you can do at home, at work, in the car, on your phone, etc.

It’s something that you do because you want to know what’s happening

ANSWER:

About 30% of all people say they didn’t feel like an adult until they started caring about what was going on in the news.

Congratulations to Judy Rambo of Connersville, IN for being the first to answer the Impossible Question!

QUESTION:

A little more than half of all people say they would say no if their mate asked them to give this up; what is it?

It has everything to do with food

Some people say they do this for their health

ANSWER:

A little more than half of all people say that they would say no if their mate asked them to give up meat and become a vegetarian.

Congratulations to Danielle Peckinpaugh of Cambridge City, IN for being the first to answer the Impossible Question!

QUESTION:

60% of all women agree that when a man does this it is a major turn off; what is it?

This can be done from a distance

ANSWER:

60% of all women agree that it’s a major turn off when a man winks at them!

Congratulations to Mike Schuyler of Knightstown, IN for being the first to answer the Impossible Question!
